resources.string: About AgriConnect:\nAgriConnect is an innovative app that provides direct incentives for small-scale farmers to sell and merchants to purchase crops hassle-free. The app uses Android Studio with Kotlin and NoSQL while incorporating APIs for additional functionalities, AgriConnect boasts an easy-to-use interface and intuitive features. As the project is still under development, I am enthusiastically contributing my skills to its ongoing refinement, ensuring its potential to impact the agricultural sector significantly.
